name: Finn Shadowstep
backstory: A former street thief from the coastal city of Saltmarsh, Finn joined the group after his mentor was killed by mysterious frost-touched assassins. He seeks revenge while using his skills to help uncover the conspiracy behind the growing winter.

recent_quote.text: I don't like the look of those footprints... too perfect, too cold.
recent_quote.context: Tracking mysterious figures through the snow
